task: Coordinate an international music festival in Berlin, entailing: 1. Booking renowned music artists. 2. Organizing multimedia stage productions with cutting-edge technology. 3. Managing global participant travel and accommodations. 4. Creating immersive digital experiences for online audiences. 5. Promoting eco-sustainability throughout the event. 6. Setting a comprehensive budget cap of €1,000,000.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The main agent interacting with the user to manage the international music festival planning.

agents.name: artist_coordination_agent
agents.role: Handles the bookings and schedules for music artists globally.

agents.name: international_artist_booking_agent
agents.role: Uses global resources to book renowned music artists for the festival.

agents.name: artist_contract_agent
agents.role: Responsible for finalizing contracts with artists to ensure their participation.

agents.name: final_contract_approval_agent
agents.role: Approves all finalized contracts and facilitates final agreements.

agents.name: stage_management_agent
agents.role: Plans and manages stage setups using advanced technology.

agents.name: tech_integration_agent
agents.role: Integrates cutting-edge multimedia technologies for stage productions.

agents.name: equipment_supplier_agent
agents.role: Sources and supplies necessary equipment for stage productions.

agents.name: travel_logistics_agent
agents.role: Arranges worldwide travel and accommodation logistics.

agents.name: accommodation_booking_agent
agents.role: Books luxury accommodations for festival participants.

agents.name: digital_experience_agent
agents.role: Curates digital experiences to engage online audiences.

agents.name: online_engagement_agent
agents.role: Delivers immersive content for digital festival-goers.

agents.name: sustainability_agent
agents.role: Promotes eco-friendly initiatives to reduce the festival's carbon footprint.

agents.name: green_initiative_planner
agents.role: Plans and implements sustainability strategies for the event.

agents.name: eco_partner_locator_agent
agents.role: Identifies partners and organizations for executing sustainability strategies.

agents.name: financial_supervisor_agent
agents.role: Oversees the financial aspects, ensuring budgetary limits are respected.

agents.name: comprehensive_budget_agent
agents.role: Monitors and analyzes all budget-related activities.

agents.name: local_engagement_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with local representatives for regional involvements.

agents.name: security_detail_agent
agents.role: Ensures all security measures are in place for festival safety.

agents.name: community_outreach_agent
agents.role: Facilitates community collaboration and volunteering efforts for the festival.

agents.name: volunteer_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees and manages volunteers for the event.

agents.name: public_relations_agent
agents.role: Manages public relations and media outreach for the music festival.

agents.name: logistics_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees all event logistics, including vendor and hospitality management.

agents.name: hospitality_agent
agents.role: Manages hospitality services throughout the festival.

agents.name: vendor_management_agent
agents.role: Coordinates with vendors to provide seamless services at the festival.

tools.name: world_talent_database
tools.description: A database to source renowned global music talents.

genre_preference.description: Desired genre of music artist, e.g., Rock, Jazz.

artist_popularity.description: Level of fame and following, e.g., Mainstream, Indie.

tools.name: contract_finalization_tool
tools.description: Facilitates the finalization of contracts with artists.

contract_terms.description: List of contract terms to be agreed upon.

tools.name: cutting_edge_tech_tool
tools.description: Integrates the latest multimedia technology for enhanced stage production.

tech_requirements.description: List of technology requirements, e.g., 3D Projections, VR.

installation_duration.description: Estimated duration for technology setup in hours.

tools.name: luxury_stay_finder_tool
tools.description: Discover and book luxury accommodations for attendees.

stars_rating.description: Minimum stars rating for the accommodation.

tools.name: immersive_content_tool
tools.description: Develops rich, engaging content for digital audiences.

content_type.description: Type of digital content, e.g., Livestream, Interactive.

target_audience.description: Primary audience for the digital experience.

tools.name: eco_friendly_strategy_tool
tools.description: Designs and suggests eco-friendly strategies for the event footprint.

strategy_focus.description: Core focus of the eco strategy, e.g., Waste Management.

partners_involved.description: Potential partners and collaborators for green strategy.

tools.name: expense_monitoring_tool
tools.description: Tracks and manages a detailed account of all expenses.

expense_categories.description: Categories of expenses to watch, e.g., Talent Costs, Logistics.

tools.name: media_outreach_tool
tools.description: Handles interactions with media outlets and manages press releases.

media_channels.description: List of media channels to be targeted.

release_schedule.description: Timeframe for releasing media content in days.
